TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FragmentNavigationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 FragmentNavigation 事件提供数据\*\*\*\*。

remarks.format: ## Remarks T 这些事件参数包含有关要导航到的内容片段的信息，并传递给 **FragmentNavigation** 事件的处理程序，该事件由以下项实现：T These event arguments contain information about the content fragment that is being navigated to, and are passed to handlers of the **FragmentNavigation** event, which is implemented by the following: - - - - 默认情况下，内容片段是一个名为的内容，其 属性已设置为，例如：By default, a content fragment is content that is contained by a named , which is a whose attribute is set, e.g.: ``` ... ``` 可以 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 通过提供具有以下格式的后缀的 URI 导航到片段：You navigate to a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fragment by providing a URI with a suffix in the following format: \#*FragmentName*\#*FragmentName* 下面显示了引用内容片段的 URI 示例：The following shows an example of a URI that refers to a content fragment: [http://www.microsoft.com/targetpage.xaml#FragmentName](http://www.www.com/homepage.xaml) 可以处理 **FragmentNavigation** 事件，并使用 来实现自定义内容片段处理实现。You can handle the **FragmentNavigation** event and use to implement a custom content fragment handling implementation.

summary.span: 获取统一资源标识符 (URI) 片段。

span.span: Gets the uniform resource identifier (URI) fragment.

value.span: 如果将该属性设置为空字符串，将默认导航到内容的顶部。

span.span: If you set the property to an empty string, the top of the content will be navigated to by default.

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否已对片段导航进行了处理的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the fragment navigation has been handled.

value.span: 如果已对导航进行了处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the navigation has been handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 设置为 `false` ，则系统将尝试查找具有片段名称的元素，并将其置于视图中。If is set to `false`, the system attempts to find an element with the name of the fragment and bring it into view. 处理 **FragmentNavigation** 事件并使用 实现自定义内容片段处理实现时，需要将设置为 `true` 以重写默认行为。When you handle the **FragmentNavigation** event and use to implement a custom content fragment handling implementation, you need to set is set to `true` to override the default behavior.
